capability.name: Branch Location Operations
capability.definition: The day to day administration of branch activity, including teller assignment and cash handling oversight
capability.role: Administer the day to day activity within the branch - allocating tellers and customer relationship managers to positions and tracking availability/performance, ensuring cash floats and product consumables are on hand and that all facilities are in working order
capability.example: Branch staff administration assigns teller positions and relationship management tasks to the branch workforce based on ongoing demand

key_features.name: Staff assignments
key_features.description: Enables staff assignments to support the day to day administration of branch activity, including teller assignment and cash handling oversight

key_features.name: Cash and non-cash movements within the branch
key_features.description: Enables cash and non-cash movements within the branch to support the day to day administration of branch activity, including teller assignment and cash handling oversight

key_features.name: Safe custody service operation
key_features.description: Enables safe custody service operation to support the day to day administration of branch activity, including teller assignment and cash handling oversight

key_features.name: Location security operations
key_features.description: Enables location security operations to support the day to day administration of branch activity, including teller assignment and cash handling oversight
